ValidationRule.description: Prevent the Send Welcome Call Automated Emails field from being updated multiple times.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( (ISCHANGED(Send_Welcome_Call_Automated_Emails__c)), (Send_Welcome_Call_Automated_Emails__c = FALSE), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Supervisor team 1"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Supervisor team 2"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Supervisor team 3"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE HR Services Supervisor team 1"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE HR Services Supervisor team 2"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Advisor Team 1"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Advisor Team 2"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Rep team 1"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Rep team 2"), ($UserRole.Name <> "System Administrator") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can not uncheck 'Send Welcome Call Automated Emails'. To stop sending automatic emails, please check the 'Stop Welcome Call Automated Emails' field.
